**Welcome to my website!**

I am an Early Career Researcher in Economics at the [School of Economics](https://www.ed.ac.uk/economics) in the University of Edinburgh.

I received my PhD from the [European University Institute](https://www.eui.eu/en/academic-units/department-of-economics) in Florence.

My research interests are:

Macroeconomics, Economic Growth and Development.

You can find my CV [here](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1-LXthUf7_Fjfl-FMZc8btXrlIHtK1Wff/view)
